Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Opening Ceremonies
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: PonyFest Online x PVFM 15th Birthday!!!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Music in the clouds
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: hii i'm DJ SoundBreaker I love DJing some hard song and I hope you will like my set ^^

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Levia's the-station-is-how-old??-ow-my-knees mix
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
I'm Levia, a former PVFM DJ from the early days who couldn't resist returning for the anniversary!
Nowadays I'm a DJ/Producer who fuses together DnB with Metal and Vocaloid.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Pretty Colors
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: My name is Mayflower, a fellow dj of both the furry fandom and brony fandom. I've been djing for over a year now and have been wanting to bring my talent back to this fandom. I bring energy to every set I make to insure that smiles are plastered on everypony's face. One of my specialties is colour bass, a genre that's fairly scares in many places.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Lantern in the Dark
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: MLP fandom veteran providing addictive pony inspired tunes since 2011. Host of Lantern in the Dark mix on PonyvilleFM, playing every other Saturday.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: A Journey Through Dance
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: A mixture of just about anything!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Scratching The Surface: Rebooted
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
DJ VinylTastic is ready to drop the bass with his electrifying, bass pumping, full throttle sets full of electro house, bounce & dubstep.

After joining forces with PonyvilleFM and taking the world by storm with his radio show “Scratching The Surface”, VinylTastic then went onto making his debut on Stage at BABScon 2017, and later on at several cons such as Everfree Northwest, Nightmare Nights, Ponyville Ciderfest, Whinny City, High Roller & Bronycon.

Following his electrifying performances across the US. VinylTastic is back and ready to party like never before!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: 15 Years of Happy Horsecore
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
Hi I'm AWal. I've been doing the DJ thing for the better part of the past 20 years or so at this point, with more than 10 of that on PonyvilleFM with my weekly show "Core Control Live!"

Expect my mix for the event to be fast, fun and energetic, so make sure to stock up on kandi braclets and glowsticks!!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Friendship is Rave PVFM 15th B-Day Special
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: uhhh i'm Thunder_Kick, been DJing for a decade, Hardcore/Drum & Bass, play a weekly show on PVFM.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Ponylicious! - THE DEMO
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: SCR4TCHK4T is a popular producer and DJ from Seattle. She's been making music in the Brony fandom since 2014. She's best known for her widely popular tracks like the infamous Antonymph Hyperpop Remix, and her originals like 'Euphoric Hoofsteps' and 'snackpack (feat. rawrity).' She's also known for her entertaining DJ sets, having performed at multiple cons and events, both online and IRL. Having performed at many PonyFest events in the past, she's back once again to showcase her favorite songs, and perform some new tracks from her upcoming album!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Sick Bleatz
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Heavy, vaporizing, emotional, ethereal sounds straight from the cyborg deer's antlers.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: "Anti Cruise Control" luvcookies! @Colorglint's Home Studio
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: This is luvcookies!, we are bgpon0414 + Colorglint .Have some release tracks on Ponies At Dawn and we performed at ponycons before but this is the first time we actually record a B2B set together! We are not so long as a team but both of us have been making music for 7 years.Our music genres are kinda different but both we love emotional and hyper energy in our music.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: I'll Name This Set Later
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Idk man I'm up against the deadline

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: PvFM 15th Birthday Rave
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
Zephcore is a musician and multi-genre DJ representing genres like: Harddance, (hard)Trance, Fandom Songs 
As a DJ he perfomed at several online and IRL Pony Events with a charactic style described as standing between angel and devil. The one side stands for chill trance beats and oldschool tunes, on the other side there are restless Hardcore kicks fun fun party funyaaa.. and much space between these.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Where We Remain
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
Where we find home, is where we remain. This is to those who have stayed in our humble abode, and helped stave off the cabin fever with wonderful melodies.

An hour of fandom Drum and Bass to celebrate fifteen years of 24/7 pony.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Prowox's Pony Party
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Prowox brings a set filled with a bunch of pony music

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Reflection
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: brambleshadow4 is a brony of 10+ years who loves who loves singing songs about ponies! For this set, he'll be singing you some of his favorite fan songs which are more reflective and introspective.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: DJ Set
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Trey Husk is bringing his signature uplifting sound to the virtual stage! Get ready to hear new show mashups, originals, and fandom classics!

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: PonyvilleFM Happy Madness
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: My name is Acid Applejack. DJ/Producer/Remixer who makes music for almost 15 years

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: PonyvilleFM 15th Anniversary
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Cod3breaker is well known by his variated style back to bring you one more time a great mix focusing mainly on EDM Brony bangers from any times to celebrate 15 years of PonyvilleFM!.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: ∆•MIX
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: I’ve been DJing melodic EDM including house, hardcore, DnB, and trance on PVFM for over a decade. I love sharing music I think is great and I hope to inspire others to spread their own creations.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Pony D&B Discovery
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description:
I've been making music for the fandom since 2019 and Co-Founder of VibePoniez, a promotional youtube channel and compilation album specialized in chill and relaxing music made by the fandom. 
I'll be playing all kind of drum&bass made by bronies, from the chillest to the angriest and from known classics to unkown bangers.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Sweeties big race
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: 10 years! and I just love pony music

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Heavy metal pony time
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Hey I am RavenFlight, long time musician and singer, but new Artist in the Fandom (releasing music for almost 1 year on YouTube and streaming services) I'm a new producer and have been releasing rock and metal songs about those wonderful ponies and the fandom, and I ain't stopping!!! I sing, scream and play guitar and have done allot of work to get myself out there and express the love! And learn along the way! I like to give a tone of energy and let it all out on the mic! Even when recording :3.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: Techno is Magic
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: I've been a DJ for two years, originally from Chile. My main genres are Techno, House, Drum & Bass, and Trance. I play at clubs in my city every weekend. I also work as a graphic designer (I graduated 4 years ago). I can assist with anything related to design if needed.

Aerial Soundwaves Stage.title: PVFM 15th Anniversary Live Request Set!
Aerial Soundwaves Stage.description: Bolt the Super-Pony has been a show host and DJ on PVFM since 2015, where he takes song requests and plays some of the best new music in the fandom on his show Music is Timeless, airing live on Friday nights at 9PM Pacific time. For this set Bolt will be taking live requests via the PT whisper system while also playing whatever tracks sound good (the set isn't made at the time of writing this so I have no idea what I'm going to play yet lol). Hope to see you there! ❤️
